data.lyric:
[ti:Want You Back]
[ar:5 Seconds Of Summer]
[al:Want You Back]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Want You Back - 5 Seconds Of Summer
[00:05.21]Written by：Jacob Kasher Hindlin/Andrew Goldstein/Asia Whitacre/Ashton Irwin/Calum Hood/Luke Hemmings/Steve Mac
[00:10.42]Can't help but wondering if this
[00:12.84]Is the last time that I'll see your face
[00:15.27]Is it tears or just the f**king rain
[00:17.85]Wish I could say something
[00:20.24]Something that doesn't sound insane
[00:22.63]But lately I don't trust my brain
[00:25.32]You tell me I won't ever change
[00:27.48]So I just say nothing
[00:29.67]
[00:32.66]No matter where I go
[00:34.54]I'm always gonna want you back
[00:36.23]
[00:37.43]No matter how long you're gone
[00:39.23]I'm always gonna want you back
[00:41.18]
[00:42.42]I know you know
[00:44.66]I will never get over you
[00:47.29]No matter where I go
[00:49.32]I'm always gonna want you back
[00:51.15]Want you back
[00:52.24]I remember the freckles on your back
[00:54.52]And the way that I used to make you laugh
[00:56.97]'Cause you know every morning I wake up
[00:59.37]Yeah I still reach for you
[01:01.85]I remember the roses on your shirt
[01:04.23]When you told me this would never work
[01:06.92]You know even when I say I moved on
[01:09.22]Yeah I still dream for you
[01:11.83]And no matter where I go
[01:13.74]I'm always gonna want you back
[01:15.38]
[01:16.65]No matter how long you're gone
[01:18.64]I'm always gonna want you back
[01:20.30]
[01:21.68]I know you know
[01:23.67]I will never get over you
[01:26.39]No matter where I go
[01:28.56]I'm always gonna want you back
[01:30.32]Want you back
[01:31.30]
[01:41.38]You know even when I say I moved on
[01:43.50]You know even though I know that you're gone
[01:45.97]All I think about is where I went wrong
[01:48.16]
[01:50.91]You know even when I say I moved on
[01:53.29]You know even though I know that you're gone
[01:55.75]All I think about is where I went wrong
[01:58.17]Yeah I still dream for you
[02:00.27]
[02:00.89]No matter where I go
[02:02.56]I'm always gonna want you back
[02:04.33]
[02:05.94]No matter where I go
[02:07.45]I'm always gonna want you back
[02:09.16]I'm always gonna want you back
[02:10.55]No matter how long you're gone
[02:12.52]I'm always gonna want you back
[02:14.05]
[02:15.58]I know you know
[02:17.66]I will never get over you
[02:20.40]No matter where I go
[02:22.32]I'm always gonna want you back
[02:24.19]Want you back
[02:25.08]
[02:32.43]Always gonna want you back
[02:33.86]Want you back
[02:34.85]
[02:42.17]Always gonna want you back
[02:43.84]Want you back
data.trans:
[ti:Want You Back]
[ar:5 Seconds Of Summer]
[al:Want You Back]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.21]//
[00:10.42]我情不自禁 只有满心疑问
[00:12.84]这将是我最后一次与你相见
[00:15.27]这到底是泪水还是雨滴
[00:17.85]但愿我说的话
[00:20.24]听起来不会太疯狂
[00:22.63]但最近我一直难以置信
[00:25.32]你竟然跟我说 我永远不会改变
[00:27.48]所以 我只能沉默不语
[00:29.67]
[00:32.66]不管我到哪里
[00:34.54]我都盼着你回到我身边
[00:36.23]
[00:37.43]不管你走了多久
[00:39.23]我都盼着你回到我身边
[00:41.18]
[00:42.42]我知道你明白
[00:44.66]我永远无法忘记你
[00:47.29]不管我到哪里
[00:49.32]我都盼着你回到我身边
[00:51.15]盼着你回到我身边
[00:52.24]我还记得你背部的雀斑
[00:54.52]还有我让你开怀大笑的样子
[00:56.97]因为 你知道每天清晨我醒来时
[00:59.37]我还是想要去找你
[01:01.85]我还记得你衬衫上的玫瑰花
[01:04.23]当你告诉我这一切都无济于事时
[01:06.92]你知道 甚至我说自己会继续向前看时
[01:09.22]我还做着关于你的幻梦
[01:11.83]不管我到哪里
[01:13.74]我都盼着你回到我身边
[01:15.38]
[01:16.65]不管你走了多久
[01:18.64]我都盼着你回到我身边
[01:20.30]
[01:21.68]我知道你明白
[01:23.67]我永远无法忘记你
[01:26.39]不管我到哪里
[01:28.56]我都盼着你回到我身边
[01:30.32]盼着你回到我身边
[01:31.30]
[01:41.38]你知道 甚至我说自己会继续向前看时
[01:43.50]你明白 尽管我知道你已狠心离去
[01:45.97]我还是只想着自己错在哪里
[01:48.16]
[01:50.91]你知道 甚至我说自己会继续向前看时
[01:53.29]你明白 尽管我知道你已狠心离去
[01:55.75]我还是只想着自己错在哪里
[01:58.17]我还做着关于你的幻梦
[02:00.27]
[02:00.89]不管我到哪里
[02:02.56]我都盼着你回到我身边
[02:04.33]
[02:05.94]不管我到哪里

[02:17.66]我永远无法忘记你
